title: Sweet potato and carrot soup with cardamom
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, diced', '1/2 teaspoon cardamom', '1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '500ml chicken stock', '500ml water', '2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced', '3 carrots, peeled and chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
